steps.text: Quick refresher on defensive three seconds
steps.narration: In the NBA, defenders aren’t allowed to spend more than three seconds in the lane unless they’re guarding someone. Basically it is like a mini-game of the floor is lava. It’s a very clear rule, but unlike other fouls, defensive three seconds isn’t called consistently.
